dict.acceptation: 接待；欢迎；招待会；接待处；

sent.orig: Provide a good grade service of reception, and do VIP reception well.
sent.trans: 提供优质前台服务，做好VIP的接待工作。

sent.orig: Reception staff to provide 24-hour reception, information, billing and messaging services.
sent.trans: 接待人员24小时提供接待、问询、结帐和留言服务。

sent.orig: The company hosted a reception for their new staff.
sent.trans: 这家公司为新职员开了个欢迎会。

sent.orig: The reception of visitors falls under the heading of administrative expenditure.
sent.trans: 接待来访者的费用归人行政管理支出费一栏。

sent.orig: The reception accorded the book has been very gratifying.
sent.trans: 这本书受到欢迎是非常可喜的事。
